name: Zombie Shooter (itch) (aslod120)
description:
This is a prototype of a game I am making in Unity3D and it is incomplete. There will be more updates to this game in the future (hopefully).

In this game I want you to die, die and upgrade your character to last the longest.

Update Notes V3

-added pause and quit game option

-added new enemies

Update Notes V2:

-added the main menu

-the game now saves your points

-you can use points to upgrade player stats

-new player stats are randomized at main menu
